entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the evening. Snow beginning in the evening and ending before morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening then light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
